title: Remove Version Requirement On M.VS.PG.NuGet
body:
Fixes https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/6116

### Changes Made
Include the next version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.PackageGroup.NuGet to unblock an internal team.

### Testing
We should run this through an experimental branch. (not prefixed with exp/ so we can use the optprof workaround)

### Notes
See teams channel

commit.message: Include the next version of M.VS.PG.NuGet

nodes.body: Merge this when the PR generated from https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_releaseProgress?_a=release-pipeline-progress&releaseId=947347 is green. It'll likely fail due to the late corext package publishing, so kick the tires every now and then.
